title: Project-Based Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Language Learning Strategies and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: A faculty development program for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on collaborative language learning and project-based environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Through writing weekly reflective journals at least three times, learners can recognize their learning strategies and propose improvement plans.
In the project process, learners can independently apply self-regulated learning stages (goal-setting, implementation, evaluation) at least 80% of the time.
By analyzing peer modeling cases, learners can modify and practice at least two of their own learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
